data.title: Barbara Robinson Book List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Barbara Robinson's books in order (7 books). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.
data.text:
The Best Christmas Pageant Ever!

Nov-1972

/ General Fiction

Hey! Unto You A Child Is Born The Herdmans were absolutely the worst kids in the history of the world. They lied and stole and smoked cigars (even the girls) and talked dirty and hit little kids and cussed their teachers and took the name of the L...

My Brother Louis Measures Worms and Other Louis Stories

Oct-1988

/ General Fiction

The Lawsons seem like a perfectly normal, happy family. Except that Louis Lawson drives the car all over town -- and he's only eight years old. Mary Elizabeth Lawson discovers, at age eleven, that her absentminded mother actually named her Marcella. ...

The Best School Year Ever

Jul-1994

/ General Fiction

The WORST Kids in the History of the World! When anything goes wrong at Woodrow Wilson Elementary School, from the hexing of Bus Six to the mysterious disappearance of the kindergarten gerbil, it's sure to have a Herdman behind it. The Herdmans ar...

The Best Halloween Ever

Aug-2004

/ General Fiction

The Herdmans plus Halloween have always spelled disaster Every Halloween, the six Herdman kids steal candy, spray-paint other kids, and take everything that isn't nailed down. And this year promises to be the same, until the Mayor decides to up an...

A Cure For Spring Fever

Apr-2024

/ Contemporary Romance

For centuries, Gamekeepers have used their magical abilities to create a buffer between the creatures who dwell in the enchanted forest and the sleepy coastal town that sits in its shadow. When Gamekeeper Stan Ross's magic begins to fail, he must fin...
